title: Geth Causes Full VM Crash
body:
#### System information

Geth version: 

[propulsion@lnx1 Downloads]$ ./geth version
Geth
Version: 1.9.26-unstable
Architecture: amd64
Go Version: go1.15.8
Operating System: linux
GOPATH=/home/propulsion/go
GOROOT=/usr/local/go

OS & Version: CentOS 8
Commit hash : n/a

#### Expected behavior
Not necessary to answer

#### Actual behaviour
When running Geth the program crashes the VM. Not the program, the VM.... 

#### Steps to reproduce the behaviour
./geth

#### Additional Info

Unable to capture any data from log file. Always crashes after sync_bloom.go

```
INFO [02-04|22:41:13.109|node/rpcstack.go:497]                 IPC endpoint opened                      url=/home/propulsion/.ethereum/geth.ipc
INFO [02-04|22:41:13.583|trie/sync_bloom.go:121]               Initialized state bloom                  items=12356 errorrate=0.000 elapsed=526.095ms
client_loop: send disconnect: Broken pipe <-- this is SSH
```

* I've built both Geth and Go from the source code and then downloaded the binaries with the same results. 
* This is the third installation of the operating system with no other software running on it.
* The OS, Go, and Geth binaries had their hashes verified. 

This shouldn't be a memory issue due to explicitly specifying a cache size as well as having 32 GB's of ram currently allocated. 

I'm absolutely out of ideas at this point and any help would be appreciated!

Please note this also occurs with the latest stable:

```
[propulsion@lnx1 Downloads]$ ./geth1.9.25-stable version
Geth
Version: 1.9.25-stable
Git Commit: e7872729012a4871397307b12cc3f4772ffcbec6
Git Commit Date: 20201211
Architecture: amd64
Protocol Versions: [65 64 63]
Go Version: go1.15.6
Operating System: linux
GOPATH=/home/propulsion/go
GOROOT=go

[propulsion@lnx1 Downloads]$ ./geth1.9.25-stable 
INFO [02-04|23:12:29.555] Starting Geth on Ethereum mainnet... 
INFO [02-04|23:12:29.555] Bumping default cache on mainnet         provided=1024 updated=4096
INFO [02-04|23:12:29.557] Maximum peer count                       ETH=50 LES=0 total=50
INFO [02-04|23:12:29.557] Smartcard socket not found, disabling    err="stat /run/pcscd/pcscd.comm: no such file or directory"
INFO [02-04|23:12:29.559] Set global gas cap                       cap=25000000
INFO [02-04|23:12:29.559] Allocated trie memory caches             clean=1023.00MiB dirty=1024.00MiB
INFO [02-04|23:12:29.559] Allocated cache and file handles         database=/home/propulsion/.ethereum/geth/chaindata cache=2.00GiB handles=131072
INFO [02-04|23:12:29.655] Opened ancient database                  database=/home/propulsion/.ethereum/geth/chaindata/ancient
INFO [02-04|23:12:29.655] Writing default main-net genesis block 
INFO [02-04|23:12:29.875] Persisted trie from memory database      nodes=12356 size=1.78MiB time=62.978451ms gcnodes=0 gcsize=0.00B gctime=0s livenodes=1 livesize=0.00B
INFO [02-04|23:12:29.876] Initialised chain configuration          config="{ChainID: 1 Homestead: 1150000 DAO: 1920000 DAOSupport: true EIP150: 2463000 EIP155: 2675000 EIP158: 2675000 Byzantium: 4370000 Constantinople: 7280000 Petersburg: 7280000 Istanbul: 9069000, Muir Glacier: 9200000, YOLO v2: <nil>, Engine: ethash}"
INFO [02-04|23:12:29.876] Disk storage enabled for ethash caches   dir=/home/propulsion/.ethereum/geth/ethash count=3
INFO [02-04|23:12:29.876] Disk storage enabled for ethash DAGs     dir=/home/propulsion/.ethash               count=2
INFO [02-04|23:12:29.876] Initialising Ethereum protocol           versions="[65 64 63]" network=1 dbversion=<nil>
WARN [02-04|23:12:29.876] Upgrade blockchain database version      from=<nil> to=8
INFO [02-04|23:12:29.877] Loaded most recent local header          number=0 hash="d4e567…cb8fa3" td=17179869184 age=51y10mo3d
client_loop: send disconnect: Broken pipe <-- SSH 
```
Wait so you're using centos in a VM right? Do you have more information (version, ssh version, how you set it up,...) so that we can repro it?

> Wait so you're using centos in a VM right? Do you have more information (version, ssh version, how you set it up,...) so that we can repro it?

Yes sir!

Steps to reproduce:
#Fresh install, 12 vCPU's, 32GB RAM, 1TB HDD
#Chose minimal installation no GUI. 
#Checksum:
SHA256 (CentOS-8.3.2011-x86_64-dvd1.iso) = aaf9d4b3071c16dbbda01dfe06085e5d0fdac76df323e3bbe87cce4318052247


#Installation Script
sudo yum -y install wget
mkdir ~/Downloads
cd ~/Downloads
#Go Language Download
wget https://golang.org/dl/go1.15.8.linux-amd64.tar.gz
sudo tar -C /usr/local -xzf go1.15.8.linux-amd64.tar.gz
echo 'export PATH=$PATH:/usr/local/go/bin' >> ~/.bash_profile
source ~/.bash_profile
#Geth Download
wget https://gethstore.blob.core.windows.net/builds/geth-linux-amd64-1.9.25-e7872729.tar.gz
tar -xzf geth-linux-amd64-1.9.25-e7872729.tar.gz


#VM crashes at first and every subsequent run:
```
[propulsion@localhost geth-linux-amd64-1.9.25-e7872729]$ ./geth --goerli 
INFO [02-05|10:44:43.193] Starting Geth on Görli testnet... 
INFO [02-05|10:44:43.194] Maximum peer count                       ETH=50 LES=0 total=50
INFO [02-05|10:44:43.194] Smartcard socket not found, disabling    err="stat /run/pcscd/pcscd.comm: no such file or directory"
INFO [02-05|10:44:43.198] Set global gas cap                       cap=25000000
INFO [02-05|10:44:43.198] Allocated trie memory caches             clean=256.00MiB dirty=256.00MiB
INFO [02-05|10:44:43.198] Allocated cache and file handles         database=/home/propulsion/.ethereum/goerli/geth/chaindata cache=512.00MiB handles=131072
INFO [02-05|10:44:43.234] Opened ancient database                  database=/home/propulsion/.ethereum/goerli/geth/chaindata/ancient
INFO [02-05|10:44:43.234] Writing custom genesis block 
INFO [02-05|10:44:43.241] Persisted trie from memory database      nodes=361 size=51.17KiB time=2.113679ms gcnodes=0 gcsize=0.00B gctime=0s livenodes=1 livesize=0.00B
INFO [02-05|10:44:43.241] Initialised chain configuration          config="{ChainID: 5 Homestead: 0 DAO: <nil> DAOSupport: true EIP150: 0 EIP155: 0 EIP158: 0 Byzantium: 0 Constantinople: 0 Petersburg: 0 Istanbul: 1561651, Muir Glacier: <nil>, YOLO v2: <nil>, Engine: clique}"
INFO [02-05|10:44:43.242] Initialising Ethereum protocol           versions="[65 64 63]" network=5 dbversion=<nil>
WARN [02-05|10:44:43.242] Upgrade blockchain database version      from=<nil> to=8
INFO [02-05|10:44:43.242] Loaded most recent local header          number=0 hash="bf7e33…b88c1a" td=1 age=2y2w3d
INFO [02-05|10:44:43.242] Loaded most recent local full block      number=0 hash="bf7e33…b88c1a" td=1 age=2y2w3d
INFO [02-05|10:44:43.242] Loaded most recent local fast block      number=0 hash="bf7e33…b88c1a" td=1 age=2y2w3d
INFO [02-05|10:44:43.244] Regenerated local transaction journal    transactions=0 accounts=0
INFO [02-05|10:44:43.251] Allocated fast sync bloom                size=512.00MiB
INFO [02-05|10:44:43.253] Starting peer-to-peer node               instance=Geth/v1.9.25-stable-e7872729/linux-amd64/go1.15.6
INFO [02-05|10:44:43.254] Stored checkpoint snapshot to disk       number=0 hash="bf7e33…b88c1a"
INFO [02-05|10:44:43.263] New local node record                    seq=1 id=a61b10fe9ccb1c7e ip=127.0.0.1 udp=30303 tcp=30303
INFO [02-05|10:44:43.264] Started P2P networking                   self=enode://e48c1480767cdd4b7852cde2d2dca037025c0575019ce1e73d2f9525ab7fa51f933086c25f44fa93e2cc3a37e6284e8dbba783d5a1ca961ea05aecbf92ceb6ef@127.0.0.1:30303
INFO [02-05|10:44:43.266] IPC endpoint opened                      url=/home/propulsion/.ethereum/goerli/geth.ipc
INFO [02-05|10:44:43.406] Initialized fast sync bloom              items=361 errorrate=0.000 elapsed=153.790ms
client_loop: send disconnect: Broken pipe
```

Christ, I might have bad RAM.... 

Can we close this for the time being? I'll report back once replaced.

Validated as an issue with a RAM card. 

Sorry for the hassle and thanks for the quick response
